title: State v. Shaurn Thomas – Episode 4 – Premeditated
description:
October 9, 2017 / Rabia examines dropped leads and potential suspects in the final episode of the Shaurn Thomas series. 
 
Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Alex Fitch, Chris Zabriskie, H-LR, Jahzzar and Uncanny Valleys.

 THANK YOU to our newest sponsor, Policy Genius!

 If you've been putting off life insurance or want to make sure you have the right one for you, checkout www.policygenius.com today. You can save up to 40% just by comparing policies and the quotes are free with no sales pressure and zero hassle. Policygenius.com is life insurance for the 21st century.

#undisclosed #shaurnthomas
